Description: The precise publication timestamp of the news article, timezone UTC-4 as per the source dataset.
The primary stock ticker that the news article is associated with, as mapped in the FNSPID dataset.
The full headline of the news article. This column provides the raw text corpus for sentiment analysis.
The news source or publisher of the article (e.g., 'Reuters', 'Benzinga', 'MarketWatch').
The direct URL to the source article, allowing for verification and potential retrieval of the full article text.
